docs.text: IEMAP Module This module provides simple functions to interact with the iemap API. The python package is available on PyPI . Quickstart Create a virtual environment and install the module in it: bash pip install iemap In your script or notebook, import the module: python from iemap import IEMAP Create an instance of the IEMAP class, using your user and password : python api = IEMAP(user, password) Use the login() method for API login: python api.login() Use the my_projects() method to get a list of your projects: python api.my_projects()
docs.title: Home
